question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. brown bowls
B. doll
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The doll is positioned on the left side of the table, partially behind the wine glasses, while the brown bowls are more centrally located and closer to the foreground; however, without a depth map, it's ambiguous whether the doll is truly further away or if the perspective makes it appear so.
